p: The global outbreaks of highly infectious viruses such as the SARS‐CoV‐2 have thus understandably seen rises in the mass purchasing of sanitizers and disinfectants, resulting in the issues of maintaining adequate supplies around several countries in the world. Without this option, a segment of the population has turned to the possibility of do‐it‐yourself formulations or alternative products that, along with the rise of social media, have largely been proliferated on the internet.
